title: New York's One-Food Wonders: A Guide
description:
New York's One-Food Wonders: A Guide to the Big Apple's Unique Single-Food Spots by Mitch Broder

English | 2015 | ISBN: 1493006428 | 216 pages | PDF | 3,5 MB


Whether you're mad about mac and cheese or loopy for lobster rolls, New York's One-Food Wonders will satisfy your desires. It's the first and only book to collect all of the city's weird, wacky, and wonderful onesies â€” the spots where a single food is the star. From OatMeals to Forbidden Fruit and from Meatball Obsession to Puddin', it takes you to scores of places you might have thought you could only dream about. It also tells you how people with dreams of their own relentlessly pursued their passions in their single-minded quests to supply you with yours. I
